data.title: Events — CityLife Church
data.meta_description: Events coming up within the life of City Life Church in Sunderland and Washington
data.text:
All Church Prayer Service

We invite you and your family to join us in our own building for a special ‘All Church Prayer Service.’ We will have an hour of extended worship, prayer, and communion. Kids Church will run alongside, just like a normal Sunday. Join us at 10am for coffee. We will start promptly at 10:30am.

View Event →

Sunday Service

Join us as we gather at our temporary venue of The Volt this Sunday.

View Event →

Sunday Service

Join us as we gather for our last Sunday Service of 2023. Julian will be bringing a message in our series Stories Jesus told.

Connect Groups

Connect Groups are when the family come together. Connect Groups meet in person every month across the city in homes, pubs and coffee shops. If you’re not part of a connect group, you can sign up by clicking here.

View Event →

Join us as we gather for our last Sunday Service of 2023. Pastor Jonny will be bringing a message that will equip us as we wrap up the year.

View Event →

Prayer Service

Every month, we gather together as a church to worship and pray. This one-hour service is for everyone who calls our church home. Prayer is such an essential ingredient to both a healthy church and a healthy disciple. Doors open at 6:15pm.

View Event →

Sunday Service

Join us as we gather for our last Sunday Service of 2023. Pastor Jonny will be bringing a message that will equip us as we wrap up the year.

View Event →

Alpha Night

Alpha Nights are a series of monthly interactive sessions to discuss the Christian faith in an informal, relaxed and friendly environment. During each Alpha session, we will meet in person and each media presentation is followed by discussion over coffee and cake. You don’t have to come to all the sessions – just pop in for the first month and see what you think. This is also a great opportunity to invite someone along who doesn’t usually come to church.

Register for free here: citylifeuk.online/alpha

View Event →

Easter for the City

Easter is the height of the Christian calendar. We have exciting plans this Easter that includes community outreach projects we call Love Week, a Good Friday service and multiple services on Sunday 31st March. Please visit citylifeuk.online/easter for services times for Good Friday and Easter Sunday.

View Event →

Love Week

Love Week is our week of service that we hold twice a year to serve and connect with our local community. This will be our first Love Week of 2024, and we are thrilled to have the opportunity to reach out to hundreds of people and share the love of Jesus with them. During Love Week, we invite people to join us for our ‘Easter for the City’ Sunday services. See below for ways you can contribute and engage in Love Week.

How you can contribute:

Bring

Serve in a project - Eg charity support groups, visits, litter pick etc

Bring a friend to a project

For more info visit the link: citylifeuk.online/love

View Event →

Special Guest Sunday

Join us as we gather for our last Sunday Service of 2023. Pastor Jonny will be bringing a message that will equip us as we wrap up the year.

View Event →

CITY YTH Night

We’re excited about launching our new monthly rhythm of youth nights. This is for any young person aged between 11-18. This night will include food, games and an opportunity to encounter Jesus.

Visit citylifeuk.online/yth for more info.

View Event →

Heart & Soul Night

If you call City Life Church home, Heart & Soul Night is designed specifically for you. The event will begin with a meal, followed by a time of collective worship and vision updates from our Senior Pastor and leadership team.

View Event →

Vision Sunday

Every February, our Senior Pastor Jonny and the leadership team present the vision for the upcoming year. It is an exciting time where we are reminded of the vision and mission of our church, and how we can actively participate in God’s purpose for our lives. Don’t forget to mark this date in your diary and make every effort to attend in person!

View Event →
